import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Payment = () => { const [paymentInfo, setPaymentInfo] = useState({ name: '', cardNumber: '', expirationMonth: '', expirationYear: '', securityCode: '', }); const history = useHistory(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setPaymentInfo({ ...paymentInfo, [name]: value }); }; const handlePayment = async () => { try { // Perform the payment process here... // If payment is successful, navigate to the Course page history.push('/course'); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; return (
